column4: I can only get sound if I am root.  What groups do I need to be in for 9.04 ?  groups I am in...  adm dialout cdrom audio plugdev lpadmin admin sambashare
why are you root, you use sudo for root access.. did you disable your sound from another group by accident?
no, I just ran sudo gnome-sound-properties  and it worked as root, not as my user
hmm.. don't know why its requesting sudo.. mine isn't.
